hero.subtitle1: Exceptional offshore accounting solutions trusted by firms across the US, Canada, Australia and Europe.
hero.subtitle2: Expert bookkeeping using Xero, QuickBooks, Sage, and more. Accurate, timely, and cost-effective.
hero.subtitle3: Comprehensive tax preparation ensuring full compliance and strategic optimization for your clients.
hero.subtitle4: Thorough audit, review and compilation of financial statements with in-depth analysis.
hero.subtitle5: Reduce complexity with a single partner for all your accounting outsourcing requirements.

home.welcomeSubtitle: Your premier destination for exceptional outsourced offshore accounting solutions.
home.ourServicesSubtitle: Comprehensive solutions to help your firm scale efficiently.
home.whyChooseSubtitle: Strategic growth through bespoke talent and tech support.
home.employersDesc: Let us help you find the perfect accounting professionals for your firm. Send us your requirements and we will match you with top talent.
home.candidatesDesc: Join our team of professionals and work with leading accounting firms from around the world.

about.title: Certified Public Accountants for Global Firms
about.subtitle: A firm of Certified Public Accountants handling exclusively outsourced assignments from firms of accountants in the USA, Canada, Europe and Australia.
about.teamDesc: Our team comprises Certified Public Accountants and Chartered Accountants from diverse nationalities and backgrounds. Our professionals have been vetted, tried and tested and are members in good standing of their respective professional bodies.
about.ifacDesc: Bound by international ethics and professional standards
about.nextStepDesc: We strongly recommend that you schedule a call to discuss further how we can contribute to the mission of your firm.

services.title: Outsourcing Services for Accounting Firms
services.subtitle: Comprehensive outsourced accounting solutions tailored to your firm's needs. We act as a one-stop shop for your company's financial requirements.
services.partnerDesc: Schedule a call to discuss further how we can contribute to the mission of your firm.

careers.title: Build Your Career at
careers.subtitle: At Multiverse CPA, we provide a challenging and rewarding environment and the chance for you to build your own knowledge and expertise.
careers.description: Our dedication to providing outstanding levels of client service means we are always on the lookout for bright and ambitious individuals to join our team of professionals.
careers.openPositionsSubtitle: Explore our current openings and find your next opportunity.
careers.noJobsDesc: Try adjusting your search or filters to find opportunities.

employers.title: Request a Candidate
employers.subtitle: If you would like us to refer a candidate meeting certain specifications, send us your request.
employers.description: Based on your needs, we shall identify the most suitable candidate for the role. We have candidates with experience handling bookkeeping, tax, audit, compilation and financial analysis. We shall allow you to interview the candidate to ascertain whether they are best fit for the role.
employers.whyChooseSubtitle: Access our pool of qualified, experienced accounting professionals.
employers.submitDesc: Tell us about your ideal candidate and we will match you with the right professional.
employers.discussDesc: Schedule a call to discuss your specific requirements and how we can help.

contact.title: Let's Have a Chat!
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Schedule a meeting, give us a call, or send us an email.
contact.sendMessageDesc: Have a question or want to learn more? Fill out the form below and we will get back to you promptly.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.servingDesc: Our team handles diverse assignments from clients across multiple continents.

blog.title: Insights & Resources
blog.subtitle: Expert perspectives on accounting, outsourcing best practices, and industry trends.
blog.newsletterDesc: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest insights on accounting outsourcing and industry trends.
